Trade/Device Name(s): On Call Sharp Blood Glucose Monitoring System
On Call Sharp Blood Glucose Meter
On Call Sharp Blood Glucose Test Strips
On Call Sharp Glucose Control Solution
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): On Call Sharp Blood Glucose Meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for On Call Sharp Blood Glucose Monitoring System for home glucose quantification using amperometric detection.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for the quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertips, forearm, and palm by people with diabetes at home to aid in monitoring diabetes control; for single patient use, not for diagnosis or screening or for use on neonates.
